column4: how do I fix my init script giving an error: unable to set GID?
I want to get my minecraft server working with an init script, but I can't get the permissions to work for non-sudoers user accounts...
an upstart script need be run as root uid, so... that's the end of it. I think.
thanks for the tip.  I was wondering if that was all that was needed.  so if I want to have backup admins able to restart the script, they must be in the sudoers file...
